trans-unit.source: If you’d like to see Mopidy Mobile in your native language, start by having a look at the existing translations. Mopidy Mobile uses angular-translate for internationalization, and stores translations as simple text files. Just take one of the existing files and replace all foreign language text as you see fit. Words within curly brackets

trans-unit.source: JukePi is a web client for the Mopidy music server. Mopidy empowers you to create a custom music server that can connect to Spotify, play local mp3s and more.

trans-unit.source: Mopidy
trans-unit.target: Mopidy

trans-unit.source: Mopidy Mobile is a simple, easy to use remote that lets you fully control a Mopidy music server from your mobile device. It is available as a Web client extension and a hybrid app for Android version 4.4 and later. Users of older Android versions may still access the Web extension using Google’s Chrome browser. On Apple devices, the Web client should work when running iOS 7 or later.
trans-unit.target: Mopidy Mobile是一个简单易用的遥控器，可让您从移动设备完全控制Mopidy音乐服务器。它可作为Web客户端扩展和 Android 4.4及更高版本的混合应用程序使用。使用旧版Android的用户仍可以使用Google的Chrome浏览器访问Web扩展。在Apple设备上，运行iOS 7或更高版本时，Web客户端应该可以工作。

trans-unit.source: Mopidy Mobile is built using Ionic v1, AngularJS and Apache Cordova, so it is recommended to familiarize yourself with these before you start.
trans-unit.target: Mopidy Mobile是使用Ionic v1，AngularJS和Apache Cordova构建的，因此建议您在开始之前熟悉它们。

trans-unit.source: Mopidy Mobile on $hostname
trans-unit.target: Mopidy Mobile on $hostname

trans-unit.source: Mopidy Web client extension for mobile devices
trans-unit.target: 移动设备的Mopidy Web客户端扩展

trans-unit.source: Mopidy events are published to the WAMP router
trans-unit.target: Mopidy事件被发布到WAMP路由器上

trans-unit.source: Mopidy extension providing a WAMP frontend
trans-unit.target: 提供WAMP前端的Mopidy扩展

trans-unit.source: Mopidy instances can now be named (fixed #2)
trans-unit.target: Mopidy实例现在可以命名了(修正#2)

trans-unit.source: Mopidy is a Python application that runs in a terminal or in the background on Linux computers or Macs that have network connectivity and audio output. Out of the box, Mopidy is an HTTP server. If you install the Mopidy-MPD extension, it becomes an MPD server too. Many additional frontends for controlling Mopidy are available as extensions.
trans-unit.target: Mopidy是一个Python应用程序，可在具有网络连接和音频输出的Linux计算机或Mac上在终端或后台运行。开箱即用的Mopidy是HTTP服务器。如果安装Mopidy-MPD 扩展名，它也将成为MPD服务器。许多其他用于控制Mopidy的前端都可以作为扩展。

trans-unit.source: Mopidy is an extensible music server written in Python
trans-unit.target: Mopidy是一个用Python编写的可扩展音乐服务器。

trans-unit.source: Mopidy plays music from local disk, Spotify, SoundCloud, Google Play Music, and more. You edit the playlist from any phone, tablet, or computer using a variety of MPD and web clients.
trans-unit.target: Mopidy可以播放本地磁盘、Spotify、SoundCloud、Google Play Music等的音乐。你可以使用各种MPD和网络客户端从任何手机、平板电脑或电脑上编辑播放列表。

trans-unit.source: Mopidy web client extension
trans-unit.target: Mopidy网络客户端扩展

trans-unit.source: Mopidy’s extension support and Python, JSON-RPC, and JavaScript APIs make Mopidy a perfect base for your projects. In one hack, a Raspberry Pi was embedded in an old cassette player. The buttons and volume control are wired up with GPIO on the Raspberry Pi, and is used to control playback through a custom Mopidy extension. The cassettes have NFC tags used to select playlists from Spotify.
trans-unit.target: Mopidy的扩展支持以及Python，JSON-RPC和JavaScript API使Mopidy成为您项目的理想基础。在一次黑客攻击中，将Raspberry Pi嵌入了一个旧的卡带播放器中。按钮和音量控制通过Raspberry Pi上的GPIO连接，用于通过自定义Mopidy扩展名控制播放。卡带上有NFC标签，用于从Spotify中选择播放列表。

trans-unit.source: Mopidy-AlarmClock was originally created by Mathieu Xhonneux and now is maintained by Davis Mosenkovs.
trans-unit.target: Mopidy-AlarmClock最初由Mathieu Xhonneux创建，现在由Davis Mosenkovs维护。

trans-unit.source: Mopidy-Slack
trans-unit.target: Mopidy-Slack

trans-unit.source: Note that the Web client is designed to be added to your home screen, so it is launched in full-screen “app mode”. If you don’t know how to add a Web application to your home screen, there are plenty of instructions available online for both Android and iOS.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，Web客户端旨在添加到您的主屏幕，因此它以全屏“应用程序模式”启动。如果您不知道如何在主屏幕上添加Web应用程序，则可以在线获取大量有关Android 和iOS的说明。

trans-unit.source: Note that there is no / before the command, this way we are not using the slack app commands. If we used this mecanism, the configuration of app would be long and difficult to maintain.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，命令前没有 / ，这样我们就不会使用slack app命令。如果我们使用这种机制，则应用程序的配置将很长且难以维护。

trans-unit.target: 或者，如果可用，请从apt.mopidy.com安装Debian / Ubuntu软件包。

trans-unit.target: 无法开始播放时（30秒或更长时间），播放备份警报声音。

trans-unit.source: Support for auto-reconnect added
trans-unit.target: 增加对自动重新连接的支持

trans-unit.source: Switched from a local IO loop to use the global IOLoop started by the HTTP-Frontend

trans-unit.source: The Raspberry Pi is an popular device to run Mopidy on, either using Raspbian, Ubuntu, or Arch Linux. Pimoroni recommends Mopidy for use with their Pirate Audio audio gear for Raspberry Pi. Mopidy is also a significant building block in the Pi Musicbox integrated audio jukebox system for Raspberry Pi.
trans-unit.target: 的覆盆子裨是流行的设备上运行Mopidy，或者使用Raspbian，Ubuntu的，或Arch Linux的。Pimoroni建议Mopidy与Raspberry Pi的Pirate Audio音频设备一起使用。Mopidy还是用于Raspberry Pi的Pi Musicbox集成音频自动点唱机系统的重要组成部分。

trans-unit.source: The Android app is available from the Google Play store. You may also join the Beta testing program to preview unreleased versions.
trans-unit.target: 可从Google Play 商店购买Android应用。您也可以加入Beta测试程序来预览未发布的版本。

trans-unit.source: The Web extension can be installed from PyPi by running:
trans-unit.target: 可以通过运行以下命令从PyPi安装Web扩展：

trans-unit.source: The application is a bespoke application with data models built upon Backbone. Even so, most models contain customisations to retrieve data from a Mopidy connection over Websockets. The websockets requirement is a core part of the Mopidy HTTP API and means that this client will be unable to function with IE9 and below. Special effort will be made to ensure that it functions well in all websockets enabled browsers.
trans-unit.target: 该应用程序是一个定制的应用程序，具有基于Backbone构建的数据模型。即使这样，大多数模型仍包含自定义项，以通过Websockets从Mopidy连接检索数据。websockets要求是Mopidy HTTP API的核心部分，这意味着此客户端将无法在IE9及以下版本上运行。将做出特别的努力以确保其在所有启用了websocket的浏览器中正常运行。

trans-unit.source: The following configuration values are available for the Web extension:
trans-unit.target: 以下配置值可用于Web扩展。

trans-unit.source: Then you need to activate the events API. This API requires the URL on which your mopidy instance is callable. If you are testing it on local you can use ngork to expose your instance on the web. After you domain, add the endpoint /slack/events.
trans-unit.target: 然后，您需要激活事件API。此API需要可在其上调用Mopidy实例的URL。如果要在本地进行测试，则可以使用ngork在网络上公开您的实例。域确定后，添加端点 /slack/events 。

trans-unit.source: This extension does NOT include a WAMP (Web Application Messaging Protocol) router.
trans-unit.target: 该扩展不包括WAMP(Web应用消息传递协议)路由器。

trans-unit.source: This extension provides a WAMP frontend for the popular Mopidy music server by connecting to a WAMP enabled router such as crossbar.io. Based on the jsonrpc module shipped with mopidy the whole API is exposed to the WAMP router as Remote Procedure Calls (RPC). Mopidy events will also be published on the WAMP router.
trans-unit.target: 通过连接到启用了WAMP的路由器（例如crossbar.io），此扩展为流行的Mopidy音乐服务器提供了WAMP前端。基于Mopidy随附的jsonrpc模块，整个API作为远程过程调用（RPC）公开给WAMP路由器。Mopidy事件也将在WAMP路由器上发布。

trans-unit.source: Timer resolution is now 5 sec.
trans-unit.target: 计时器的分辨率现在是5秒。

trans-unit.target: 要构建Mopidy Web扩展，你需要有NPM和大口安装。然后运行：

trans-unit.source: To get started with Mopidy, begin by reading the installation docs.
trans-unit.target: 要开始使用Mopidy，请先阅读 安装文档。

trans-unit.source: To work on this project, you will need to have the node and npm binaries installed. Clone the project:
trans-unit.target: 要在这个项目上工作,你需要安装node和npm二进制文件。克隆这个项目。

trans-unit.source: To work you need to create a Slack App and install it to your workspace. This way you get the bot user OAuth access token, useful later
trans-unit.target: 要工作，您需要创建一个Slack App并将其安装到您的工作区中。通过这种方式，您可以获得机器人用户的OAuth访问令牌，此令牌稍后会有用

trans-unit.source: Translations: slimer (Español, Català), Andrzej Raczkowski (Polski), Peter Kuderjavy (Slovak), Gilbert Brault (Français).
trans-unit.target: 翻译：更苗条（西班牙语，加泰罗尼亚语），安德烈·拉茨科夫斯基 （波兰斯基），彼得·库德里亚维（斯洛伐克）， 吉尔伯特·布劳特（法语）。

trans-unit.source: Updated README/Changelog.
trans-unit.target: 更新了 README/Changelog。

trans-unit.source: Updated Shuffle method.
trans-unit.target: 更新了洗牌方法。

trans-unit.source: Upgraded to Mopidy 3.0+ and Python 3.7+.
trans-unit.target: 升级到Mopidy 3.0+和Python 3.7+。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: Vanilla Mopidy only plays music from files and radio streams. Through extensions, Mopidy can play music from cloud services like Spotify, SoundCloud, and Google Play Music. With Mopidy’s extension support, backends for new music sources can be easily added.
trans-unit.target: Vanilla Mopidy仅播放文件和广播流中的音乐。通过 扩展，Mopidy可以播放来自Spotify，SoundCloud和Google Play音乐等云服务的音乐。借助Mopidy的扩展支持，可以轻松添加新音乐源的后端。

trans-unit.source: WAMP Authentication is currently not supported
trans-unit.target: 目前不支持WAMP认证

trans-unit.source: WAMP realm is configurable via mopidy config
trans-unit.target: WAMP领域可以通过mopidy配置来配置。

trans-unit.source: WebSocket and WebSocket-over-SSL is supported
trans-unit.target: 支持WebSocket和WebSocket-over-SSL。

trans-unit.source: You also need to subcribe the app to the event message.channels. This way the app will receive all messages posted in channel where its had been added. Beware not to post confidential data :warning:
trans-unit.target: 您还需要为该应用订阅事件 message.channels 。这样，应用程序将收到添加到其频道中的所有消息。注意不要发布机密数据：警告：

trans-unit.source: You and the people around you can all connect their favorite MPD or web client to the Mopidy server to search for music and manage the playlist together. With a browser or MPD client, which is available for all popular operating systems, you can control the music from any phone, tablet, or computer.
trans-unit.target: 你和身边的人都可以将自己喜欢的MPD或网络客户端连接到Mopidy服务器上,一起搜索音乐和管理播放列表。通过浏览器或MPD客户端(适用于所有流行的操作系统),你可以在任何手机、平板电脑或电脑上控制音乐。
